snippet: Mets players and the general manager sounded votes of confidence last week for Manager Terry Collins, whose position seems secure despite a second straight season that went awry.
abstract: New York Mets players and general manager sound votes of confidence for manager Terry Collins, whose position seems secure despite a second straight season that went awry.
lead_paragraph: Mets players and the general manager sounded votes of confidence last week for Manager Terry Collins, whose position seems secure despite a second straight season that went awry.

headline.seo: Mets Stick by Terry Collins, for Now
headline.main: Collins Has Not Paid a Big Price for Losing
headline.print_headline: Collins Has Not Paid A Big Price for Losing
